body: Hi I really need help pls in leader boards I'm 173 but when u look on my profile its says 365 and i really want it changed zoo can u guys pppPPLLLLLLEEESSSSSEEEEE fix this problem

title: My rank

replies.body:
It's a bug/glitch, it happened a few weeks back.
Don't worry, the rank on the leaderboard is the true one :)
